snippet.title: A Day In My Life

snippet.description:
If you need a high converting store, check this out! - http://ecomhacksacademy.com/starterkit
-
Learn how we've been able to scale multiple 7-figure eCommerce businesses 👉 https://ecomhacksacademy.com/optin-21044751
-
Get a FREE 2-week trial of Shopify to start dropshipping right now!!! 👉 https://www.shopify.com/?ref=jaredgoetz
-
If you want me to call YOU next week, follow me on instagram (@jaredgoetz) and send me a DM with your phone number!
-
Check out my new book on Amazon 'Overnight Success: The Inner Game Playbook For Your First Big Breakthrough' - https://www.amazon.com/Overnight-Success-Inner-Playbook-Breakthrough/dp/1795341440
-
-
Website: https://jaredgoetz.com/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jaredgoetz/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/goetzjared?lang=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jgoetz3
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jared-goetz-8ab1314b/
-
-
Hey! My name is Jared Goetz and I am a serial entrepreneur who is most known for my success building multiple seven-figure e-commerce stores and creating the eCom Hacks Academy, one of the largest e-commerce education platforms worldwide. Since creating the second-fastest growing Shopify store of 2017, I've earned exposure to coveted entrepreneurs and have grown my network to include hundreds of like-minded and successful individuals.

Coming from humble beginnings, I've made it my mission to utilize the skills and relationships to better serve my community, which includes eCom Hacks Academy team members and a robust social media following.
-
-
Here are some more videos! :)
-
-
JARED GOETZ: From $0-$2 Million In 60 Days On Shopify Behind Kylie Jenner! (Full Interview) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bltaMVp8G_E
-

-

snippet.title: The Law of Vibration, Positive Energy, and Mental Exercises with Scott Hilse

snippet.description:
Let's discuss the efficiencies of presence. Enjoy! Add me on Instagram - @jaredgoetz

Jared Goetz is a 30-year-old modern-day entrepreneur who has shifted focus from building eCommerce empires to building inner empires. Having gone through the attainment of material gains, and seeing patterns, Jared realized that the route to fulfillment is through inner game and spirituality.

The Modern Soul podcast aims to bring knowledge of the best minds in the world to the everyday listener on topics regarding meditation, mindset, routines, goal-setting, biohacking, nutrition, mental health, and much more.

STREAM THE NEW PODCAST: https://anchor.fm/modernsoul

Learning about presence does not in fact make you present. The only way to do so is to BE present. A deep level of awareness. Clearing your mind allows you to think much better.

Being present is about the practice of being present. The feeling more than thought. It's all about feeling. When you practice, you can get deeper and more aware, in tune with your presence.

Presence allows you to get more done. It increases the efficiency of your being. We struggle with presence due to the overwhelming amount of thoughts in our minds at any moment. 

Swarming thoughts induce more anxiety and fear. An ambient feeling of uneasiness will hold you back and your perspective on all things will be skewed. If you always find yourself perceiving things worse off than you should, you will lead yourself down a path you won't want to go down.

If you are present, your life feels that much better. Live more efficiently.

This episode of the podcast was produced by True Lead Generation. They are a full-service marketing agency offering a host of various services ranging from content creation to reputation management. Learn more at www.trueleadgen.com 

For business or other inquiries, you can reach me and my team at dean@jaredgoetz.com

*Some of the links and other products that appear on this video are from companies in which Jared Goetz will earn an affiliate commission or referral bonus. Jared Goetz is part of an affiliate network and receives compensation for sending traffic to partner sites. The content in this video is accurate as of the posting date. Some of the offers mentioned may no longer be available.
snippet.title: Efficiencies of Presence & Improving Your Quality of Life through Mindfulness

snippet.description:
Let's discuss the story of Akil Kurji, being able to achieve massive success after some huge obstacles came his way. Kurji faced criminal charges and jail time as well as some other tough setbacks, but shifted his perspective and used these difficulties to get his mind right, take care of his mental and physical health, and catapult his way to the top. This story is seriously one of a kind. Enjoy! Add me on Instagram - @jaredgoetz

snippet.description:
Let's discuss the habits of serial entrepreneur, keynote speaker, and respected thought-leader Sharran Srivatsaa. Sharran came to the United States from India at a young age, played tennis at the professional level, and then went on to exit 5 companies successfully! Today we talked about the tools and techniques he uses to stay on task each day. He runs 'The 5 am Club' where he talks to nearly 6,000 individuals to start their day right. We talked about addressing "ambient anxiety", and how to eliminate that. Enjoy! Add me on Instagram - @jaredgoetz

Jared Goetz is a 30-year-old modern-day entrepreneur who has shifted focus from building eCommerce empires to building inner empires. Having gone through the attainment of material gains, and seeing patterns, Jared realized that the route to fulfillment is through inner game and spirituality.

The Modern Soul podcast aims to bring knowledge of the best minds in the world to the everyday listener on topics regarding meditation, mindset, routines, goal-setting, biohacking, nutrition, mental health, and much more.
